place.name: STEVENTON
place.gazetteerText: STEVENTON, a parish in Basingstoke district, Hants; on the Southwestern railway, 6½ miles SW of Basingstoke. It has a post-office under Micheldever Station. Acres, 2,100. Real property, £1,664. Pop., 167. Houses, 38. The manor belongs to E. Knight, Esq. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Winchester. Value, £85.* Patron, the Rev. G. Alder. The church is ancient but good. Miss Austen was a native. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
